Package org.apache.hadoop.hive.accumulo.mr

map reduce and supporting classes

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccumuloIndexDefinition
    Index table definition.
    AccumuloIndexedOutputFormat
    Extension of AccumuloOutputFormat to support indexing.
    AccumuloIndexedOutputFormat.AccumuloRecordWriter  
    HiveAccumuloRecordReader
    Translate the Key Value pairs from AccumuloInputFormat to a Writable for consumption by the AccumuloSerDe.
    HiveAccumuloSplit
    Wraps RangeInputSplit into a FileSplit so Hadoop won't complain when it tries to make its own Path.
    HiveAccumuloTableInputFormat
    Wraps older InputFormat for use with Hive.
    HiveAccumuloTableOutputFormat  
    IndexOutputConfigurator
    Extension of OutputConfigurtion to support indexing.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IndexOutputConfigurator.WriteOpts
    Accumulo Write options.
